text:
ces of iron 
include:
• fortified	breakfast	cereals	
(choose the one that has 
extra iron added); 
• pulses (beans); 
• eggs; 
• bread (wholemeal); 
• green leafy vegetables 
(broccoli, cabbage, 
spinach); 
• dried	fruit	(apricots,	figs);
• tofu;
• nuts and seeds.
Aim to eat at least four 
portions of these foods each 
day, especially if you are 
vegetarian.
Iron absorption
To help your body absorb the 
iron in food, eat iron-rich foods 
alongside foods rich in vitamin 
C, like: 
• fruit (kiwi,
